text: The Motherland Party () is a nationalist and conservative political party in Azerbaijan. It was founded in 1990."History" Its members are mainly Azerbaijanis who come from Armenia. The party's leader Fazail Agamali is a former deputy minister for social protection. The party's aim is to create a free, powerful, democratic and entire Azerbaijan."Party Program" At the 2010 parliamentary elections, it won 2 out of 125 seats.Republic of Azerbaijan Legislative Elelction of 7 November 2010. Azerbaijan Election Commission. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Political parties in Azerbaijan Category:Nationalist organizations in Azerbaijan Category:Conservative parties
title: Motherland Party (Azerbaijan)
